    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
The clash between Arsenal and Olympiakos at the Emirates Stadium was a thrilling encounter that saw both teams play with immense passion and determination. The match finished 2-3 in favor of the visitors, Olympiakos, and it was a roller-coaster ride from start to finish.

From the moment the referee blew his whistle at 00:00, signaling kick-off, Arsenal immediately seized the initiative. The initial stages were hotly contested, with both sides trying hard to stamp their authority on the game. However, the first significant action came rather quickly when the ball was put out of play at 00:47, leading to a throw-in by Olympiakos at 00:59. This pattern repeated multiple times in the opening minutes, reflecting a physical and tense battle for control.

At 09:17, Olympiakos earned a corner, which showed their attacking intent early on. However, Arsenal countered and managed to take a shot off target at 09:32, their first real attempt at goal. The ball went out of play and was cleared by an Olympiakos defender at 10:00, showing good defensive organization.

The game continued to see-saw, with both teams committing fouls in the pursuit of control. Arsenal committed a foul at 10:23, giving Olympiakos a direct free-kick at 10:55. Arsenal then got an opportunity when they caught Olympiakos offside at 12:12, leading to an indirect free-kick at 12:25. This period of the game was characterized by midfield battles and turnovers, with neither side able to establish a clear dominance.

The first half saw Arsenal making several throw-ins as they kept trying to penetrate the disciplined Olympiakos defense. Yet it was Olympiakos who struck first at 31:56, with a goal that came in a spectacular fashion right after a shot on target following a corner at 31:53. Arsenal kicked off again at 32:46, eager to claw back the deficit. Within minutes, Arsenal responded with a goal at 34:26, demonstrating their resilience with a well-taken shot that brought them back on level terms.

Olympiakos, undeterred by the equalizer, retook the lead at 39:22 after a corner at 39:20, showcasing their excellent set-piece execution. Arsenal kicked off at 40:21, but by the close of the first half, tensions rose, seeing yellow cards issued to Arsenal players at 42:58 and 44:28 following fouls as the team tried to regain momentum.

As the second half commenced, Olympiakos made a substitution and kicked off with renewed energy. The game quickly returned to its full pace, and early on, Olympiakos had a notable chance but shot off target at 04:01. Arsenal kept pushing back, utilizing throw-ins and corners to create opportunities, such as the corner at 09:33 which came shortly after another one at 08:40.

Arsenal’s tactical adjustments led to a series of attacks, although they also had to be cautious to avoid giving away free-kicks for fouls. Their persistence paid off when they made a substitution and later capitalized on two shots on target in quick succession at 15:04 and 15:06. The defensive clearances by Olympiakos at 16:22 and 17:18 indicated their robust defense trying to hold off the relentless Arsenal pressure.

The second half witnessed a thrilling exchange of goals. Arsenal's breakthrough came at 19:53 following a period of sustained pressure, making it 2-2. But the joy was short-lived as Olympiakos responded almost immediately with a goal at 20:53, showcasing their lethal counter-attack and confirming the game's end-to-end nature.

With Olympiakos leading 3-2, Arsenal fought desperately to find an equalizer. Arsenal pushed forward with corners and direct free kicks, creating a few more chances such as the shot off target at 42:06, showing their determination and never-say-die attitude until the final whistle. Despite their efforts, including several substitutions to bring fresh legs into the game at 40:01, Arsenal couldn’t find the net again.

In the closing moments, Arsenal continued to apply pressure with corners at 42:23 and 44:30, but Olympiakos held firm, blocking shots and clearing their lines efficiently to secure the victory. Throughout the game, Arsenal displayed moments of brilliance, and their attacking prowess was clearly visible through their various attempts and shots on target. Nevertheless, Olympiakos were better organized and more clinical when it mattered most.

By the end of the match, the statistics of ball out of play, throw-ins, and set plays painted a picture of a high-intensity, physically demanding game where both teams left everything on the pitch. Each goal was a result of careful play and tactical execution, particularly Olympiakos' ability to capitalize on set-pieces and counter-attacking opportunities, which ultimately saw them emerge victorious in a hard-fought 2-3 win over the hosts, Arsenal. This match will be remembered for its dramatic turns and the relentless spirit of both teams, making it a thrilling spectacle for all fans in attendance.
